item.title: Finger dislocator: creating negative feelings in VR
item.description: In this project, I wanted to design and implement an example of Persuasive Design. The idea was to simulate physiological harm to induce negative feelings (fear, discomfort) for a user, in order to make them pull their hand away from an area. During the process, I used a haptic device to increase the realism of my prototype. I realized that if the device was effective in creating more negative feelings, it meant that there was a potential of harm in building more and more realistic haptics devices.
